column6: One way or the other, THE ORDER ends here! Shell-shocked, shattered, and--worst of all-depowered, the men and women that were once the Order stand face-to-face with their ultimate nemesis. They might be broken--but can The Order be beaten?
column8: | writer:Matt Fraction | penciller (cover):Barry Kitson | letterer:Dave Lanphear | inker:Mark Morales | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
